name: Psurlon Ringer
languages: Deep Speech plus the languages of the Humanoid it is imitating

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Crush
entries: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, taking 12 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
